Additionally, because only one copy of the TNFRSF1A gene has a mutation, some normal TNFR1 proteins are produced and can bind to the TNF protein, leading to additional inflammation. It is unclear if disruption of the apoptosis pathway plays a role in the signs and symptoms of TRAPS.",GHR,tumor necrosis factor receptor-associated periodic syndrome
Is tumor necrosis factor receptor-associated periodic syndrome inherited ?,
